about_the_game:
As a token of gratitude to our community, we're unveiling the Royal Gold Bar as a unique cosmetic pre-order bonus for those who support us by pre-ordering the upcoming Suzerain: Kingdom of Rizia DLC. Purchasers will also receive a 10% discount on the DLC with the pre-order.

The Royal Gold Bar is a symbol of Rizia’s wealth and riches, eternalized into this one kilogram bar of solid gold and ornate golden coin. Mined by Rizia’s Royal Gold, it will adorn your king's desk, serving as a token of gratitude and creation. This special gold bar is exclusively available by pre-ordering the Kingdom of Rizia DLC.

Your commitment fuels our passion for expanding the Suzerain Universe. Thank you for believing in our work, vision, and supporting us directly.

short_description: The Royal Gold Bar, an exclusive pre-order bonus for Kingdom of Rizia DLC, symbolizes Rizia's opulence. Meticulously crafted by Rizia's Royal Gold, this solid gold bar and ornate coin will elegantly decorate your king's desk, expressing gratitude for your support in Suzerain's expanding universe.
